snippet.title: Legrand Legacy || Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Legrand Legacy arrives as prophesied today!

This nostalgic love letter to classic JRPGs is out now for PC on Steam, GOG, Humble Store, and GameJolt!

Buy on Steam || http://store.steampowered.com/app/556740/
Buy on GOG || https://www.gog.com/game/legrand_legacy
Buy on Humble Store || https://www.humblebundle.com/store/legrand-legacy-tale-of-the-fatebounds
Buy on Game Jolt || https://www.humblebundle.com/store/legrand-legacy-tale-of-the-fatebounds
___

Join the Discord || https://discord.gg/ai/
Like our Facebook || https://www.facebook.com/legrandlegacy/
Follow on Twitter || https://twitter.com/LegrandLegacy
